definitions.definition: The aggregating , writing , editing , and presenting of news or news articles for widespread distribution, typically in electronic publications , broadcast news media, or printed newspapers or periodicals, for the purpose of informing the audience, relying on a style of writing characteristic for this purpose, consisting of direct presentation of facts or events and (depending on type) either with or without analysis or interpretation.

main_definition: The aggregating , writing , editing , and presenting of news or news articles for widespread distribution, typically in electronic publications , broadcast news media, or printed newspapers or periodicals, for the purpose of informing the audience, relying on a style of writing characteristic for this purpose, consisting of direct presentation of facts or events and (depending on type) either with or without analysis or interpretation.
